children.text:
Important!
If widgets are disappearing from home screen after update of this app (ECW) on the Play Store it is NOT this app malfunction!!! It happens mostly on Samsung devices with original Touchwiz launcher on Android 4.x! This app cannot remove widgets from the home screen and is NOT running during an update! Use another launcher instead of TouchWiz (Nova, Go, Google, etc..)
Please don't downrate because of this! Thanks for your understanding! ;)

What's new:
v1.9.4
+ new icons
+ Android 5.1 support
- no more Android 2.2-2.3 support
v1.9.3
+ manual refresh button on counters page
+ 1x1 widget hotfix on Android 2.3
v1.9.2
+ first part of a bigger update
+ new main app icon
+ navigation menu (left side)
+ counters page: list widgets
+ reach ECW Facebook page
+ repeating shows icon on widget
v1.9.1
! fixed counter 1 day miss caused by Daylight saving
+ new How To video on YouTube
+ Swedish and Slovenian translation
v1.9.0
+ Lollipop Material Design
v1.8.0
+ export widget datas to file (only 1 in free version)
+ import widget datas from file
+ support up to Android 5.0
# icons update
v1.7.9
+ 9 new icons
# bigger icon on 2x1 or bigger layout
# bigger icons on icon chooser
# bigger counter when title is hidden
+ Croatian translation, Arabic fix
v1.7.8
+ reminder with hours:mins format

Premium version advantages:
+ event loading from Google Calendar
+ no widget export restriction
+ 100 new vibrant color
+ individual sound for reminder
+ Ad and Internet permission free
